name: Animals of War
description:
Animals of War is a two player game in which one player battles the other over a fierce fight in the skies. This game was made for the "My First Game Jam".

Player One controls

W,S = Speed

A,D = Turning

Space Bar = Fire

Player Two Controls

Up, Down arrow keys = Speed

Left, Right arrow keys = Turning

Right Ctrl = Fire

Game Modes

There are two game modes, Dog Fight and Food Hunt. In Dog Fight you simply battle the other player and the one with the most kills when time runs out wins. Food Hunt is the same concept except instead of winning by the amount of kills, you win by collecting the food bowls.

Future Development

As for the future of the game, I have no idea what will happen. It could get updates and various features such as AI so the game can be played in single player, More maps, Music, Multiplayer so you can play online. But I mean we will see what happens.

Thank you such much, and I hope you have a fun time playing my game.
